articles.title: Four people in North Carolina monitored for coronavirus
articles.description: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — North Carolina health officials said four people who recently returned to Charlotte from China are being monitored for coronavirus symptoms.
articles.content:
CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) North Carolina health officials said four people who recently returned to Charlotte from China are being monitored for coronavirus symptoms.
The four were being held in self-quarantine, according to the Mecklenburg County Health Departme… [+715 chars]

articles.title: Women's Asia-Pacific Amateur postponed due to new virus
articles.description: ST. ANDREWS, Scotland (AP) — The Women's Asia-Pacific Amateur has been postponed next week in Thailand because of the new virus from China.
articles.content:
ST. ANDREWS, Scotland (AP) The Women's Asia-Pacific Amateur has been postponed next week in Thailand because of the new virus from China.
That makes three golf events canceled or rescheduled because of the coronavirus that has infected more than 34,800 peopl… [+1183 chars]

articles.title: New Man U signing from China to skip training camp in Spain
articles.description: MANCHESTER, England (AP) — Manchester United’s newest signing will not travel to a training camp in Spain during the Premier League’s midseason break because the club fears restrictions in place to combat the spread of a new virus in China…

articles.title: Drivers in NJ, around nation still seeing lower gas prices
articles.description: TRENTON, N.J. (AP) — Drivers in New Jersey and around the nation are still seeing prices at the pump decline amid lower demand and an increase in supplies.
articles.content:
TRENTON, N.J. (AP) Drivers in New Jersey and around the nation are still seeing prices at the pump decline amid lower demand and an increase in supplies.
AAA Mid-Atlantic says the average price of a gallon of regular gas in New Jersey on Friday was $2.51, do… [+594 chars]

articles.title: 5 Britons with virus hospitalized in France after Alps stay
articles.description: Five people from Britain, including one child, are hospitalized in France with the new virus from China after contracting it during a holiday in the Alps.
articles.content:
Five people from Britain, including one child, are hospitalized in France with the new virus from China after contracting it during a holiday in the Alps.
Saturday's announcement by the French health minister is the latest example of how the tentacles of the… [+1740 chars]

articles.content:

articles.author: By DAKE KANG, NOEL SICHALWE and CARA ANNA Associated Press
articles.title: 'We're definitely not prepared': Africa braces for new virus
articles.description: LUSAKA, Zambia (AP) — At a Chinese-run hospital in Zambia, some employees watched as people who recently returned from China showed up with coughs but were not placed in isolation. A doctor tending to those patients has stopped coming to…

articles.author: By The Associated Press
articles.title: New virus has infected more than 34,800 people globally
articles.description: A viral outbreak that began in China has infected more than 34,800 people globally.
articles.content:
A viral outbreak that began in China has infected more than 34,800 people globally.
